00020 class SwarmEventDetector : public CTabPageSSL {
00021         public:
00022         int IDD;
00023         CString name;
00024         int m_everyNframe;             // perform event detection every N-th frame
00025         SwarmEventDetector() {};
00026         SwarmEventDetector(CString name, int idd) {CTabPageSSL (idd, NULL); this->name = name; IDD = idd;};
00027         virtual int    DetectEvents(int nFrame, CNewVisionDoc* doc) {return 0;};
00028         virtual int    DetectActivities(int nFrame, CNewVisionDoc* doc) {return 0;};
00029         virtual int        PostProcessActivities(CNewVisionDoc* doc) {return 0;};
00030         virtual double ComputeDistance(BodyCluster* bi, BodyCluster* bj) {return 0;};   
00031         virtual double ComputeSpread(BodyCluster* bi) {return 0;};      
00032         virtual double ComputeGroupClusteringValidity(CArray<BodyCluster*>& cl) {return 0;};
00033         virtual void   Serialize(CArchive& ar) { ar.IsStoring() ? ar << m_everyNframe : ar >> m_everyNframe; };
00034 };

00036 class ProximityEventDetector : public SwarmEventDetector {
00037         public:
00038         ProximityEventDetector(CString name, int idd) {this->name = name; IDD = idd;};
00039         double m_distanceThreshold; // max distance in (cm) to be a part of the same group
00040         int    m_maturePath;        // min number of (seconds) in a path to consider it for grouping

00047         virtual void Serialize(CArchive& ar);

00051 class GroupingEventDetector: public SwarmEventDetector {
00052         public:
00053         GroupingEventDetector(CString name, int idd);
00054         double m_dwellWeight;             // Co-dwelling: co-dwell with swarm mates
00055         double m_alignmentWeight;         // Alignment: steer towards the average heading of the local flock-mates
00056         double m_cohesionWeight;          // Cohesion: steer to move toward the average position of local flock-mates
00057 
00058         double m_maxGroupDiameter;          // Maximum distance (cm) from the center of the group to be considered a part of the group
00059         double m_fitnessThreshold;        // Body score to be a member of a group
00060 
00061         double m_actT1; // add to activity
00062         double m_actT2; // add to and create new activity
00063

00065         virtual BOOL OnInitDialog();

00067         virtual double ComputeSpread(BodyCluster* bi);
